title: any champion with atleast 3 of those requirements
body: AOE damage ability. can splitpush. is pretty tanky. can affect a whole teamfight. can escape from ganks. roaming is pretty good.

Nasus, Darius, Ornn, Rumble, Gnar, Garen...loads of top laners fit these requirements. Rather than listing all the champions in the game which fit three of these (almost everybody has at least three of these), why not build items to make the champs you like more tanky/split-push/agile? For instance, I build Rod of Ages on almost every mid champ, because I hate cheap ass flash/ignite Zeds. Totally ruins their game with a single item.

actually now that I thought about it more, although not on the mechanically easier side of things, {{champion:164}} is a great pick, she literally meets all the criteria you listed in the OP.

her passive helps her tank through fights and 1v1's while her main builds give her plenty of off-tankiness enabling her to take a decent beating, shes an AMAZING duelist, and unlike most people who opt into splitpushing, she can teamfight relatively well. her ultimate is great at locking someone down because they cant leave unless you do, so you synergize well with most other champions in the game, and makes for excellent roams. her E is a free ass oopsies undo button, so laning your relatively safe, and as a scaling diver your pretty much set to go.

Consider {{champion:82}}. He can play either lane, has great push, his escape isn't great but taking objectives is where he shines. Get rift at 18 mins, go bot. Put it there, take dragon, take it mid/bot/baron (he can solo with 1 item and a dragon). If you really want to you can take demolish for more turret damage but yeah, he's super strong if you know how to play him

{{champion:83}} is also a good option.
not that I would think of, but remember as an artillery mage he isn't generally close enough to take harass anyway, and his w is a free escape

For mid, the clear choice is Ziggs. His farming is phenomenal and can't be denied, he takes down turrets faster than just about anyone else, and his long-range ult and AoE cc is amazing for teamfights.

For top, I'd recommend Garen or Jayce. Garen has amazing farm ability, an empowered auto that works on turrets, and becomes really hard to push out of lane after level 13, as his regen just brings him back in seconds (Warmog's makes this utterly ridiculous). Jayce is the better choice if you want a safer ranged option to farm. He also has great wave clear, and becomes really dangerous even to lane bullies after an item or two. His empowered autos work on turrets, as well, and his cannon-form W makes taking down turrets pretty easy. His teamfighting is good, with his long range poke from an E-empowered cannon-form Q, and then his AoE W in hammer form.
